Position: Senior Sales Manager - Microgrid

Location: Remote

Industry: Microgrid/Distributed Energy Resources
• *Experience working with Microgrids & understanding of the grid, DER, controls etc is a must have**

Role Summary:

We are seeking a Sr. Sales Manager to join an fast growing start-up with PE backing firm in the Microgrid/DER industry. This strategic role requires an individual capable of forging strong sales relationships with EPCs, Developers, Manufacturing Facilities, & Vendors

Responsibilities:
• Creating sales opportunities with large C&I companies (especially those with heavy manufacturing footprints), large energy asset management companies, large utilities, and large project development / construction firms.
• Boosts sales growth by building effective channels with OEMs, Utility/REPs, EPCs, Aggregators, and Distributors. Ensures channel success through collateral, incentives, training, and support for partners.
• Demonstrates expertise in controls, optimization, and distributed energy resources (DERs),
• Coordinate with internal teams, including marketing, product development, and legal, to ensure seamless integration of sales goals.

Qualifications:
• 7+ years of experience implementing business strategy and/or sales in the cleantech or renewables industry.
• 3+ years of sales management experience leading a high performing sales team
• Excellent knowledge and understanding of DER equipment and applications – including solar arrays, batteries, generators, fuel cells, among others.
• Experienced in selling to or collaborating with price-sensitive energy industry organizations, including large C&I companies (especially those with extensive manufacturing operations), energy asset management firms, utilities, and project development/construction companies.
• Experience in traditional power/energy markets and sales processes is beneficial, encompassing capacity, ancillary services, demand response, SGIP, SMART, or similar state incentives.
• Experience evaluating and responding to complex RFPs / RFIs.
